      • getTextureManager

        public ITextureManager getTextureManager()
        Specified by:
        getTextureManager in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Returns:
        The texture manager for this coordinator.

      • bindTexture

        public int bindTexture(ITexture texture)
        Description copied from interface: ITextureCoordinator
        Binds the given texture to a texture unit on the GPU.

        An optimal binding index will be determined, possibly overriding an existing binding.
        If the texture is already bound by this coordinator, there will be no effect.

        Note: The texture must be managed and loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.

        Specified by:
        bindTexture in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be bound.
        Returns:
        The index of the texture unit the texture was bound to.

      • requestIndexFor

        public int requestIndexFor(ITexture texture)
        Description copied from interface: ITextureCoordinator
        Determines a binding index for the given texture and marks it as externally bound.

        The binding index will be determined in the same way as ITextureCoordinator.bindTexture(ITexture), only the texture will not be bound.
        If the texture is already bound by this coordinator, there will be no effect.

        The coordinator will assume that the texture is bound to that index.
        No calls to the GPU will be made.

        Note: The texture must be managed and loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.

        Specified by:
        requestIndexFor in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture for which a index should be determined.
        Returns:
        The index of the texture unit that was chosen.

      • peekIndexFor

        public int peekIndexFor(ITexture texture)
        Description copied from interface: ITextureCoordinator
        Determines a binding index for the given texture.

        The binding index will be determined in the same way as ITextureCoordinator.bindTexture(ITexture), without having an effect.

        Note: The texture must be managed and loaded by this coordinator's texture manager.

        Specified by:
        peekIndexFor in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture for which a index should be determined.
        Returns:
        The index of the texture unit that was chosen.

      • getTextureIndexFor

        public int getTextureIndexFor(ITexture texture)
        Description copied from interface: ITextureCoordinator
        Returns the index of the texture unit that the given texture is bound to.
        Specified by:
        getTextureIndexFor in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture of which the binding index should be returned.
        Returns:
        A texture unit index, or -1 if the texture is not bound by this coordinator.

      • unbindTexture

        public void unbindTexture(ITexture texture)
        Description copied from interface: ITextureCoordinator
        Unbinds the given texture.

        If the texture is not bound by this coordinator, there will be no effect.

        Specified by:
        unbindTexture in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture that should be unbound.

      • getBoundTextureForIndex

        public ITexture getBoundTextureForIndex(int textureIndex)
        Description copied from interface: ITextureCoordinator
        Returns the texture which is bound for the given index.
        Specified by:
        getBoundTextureForIndex in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Parameters:
        textureIndex - The binding index for which the texture should be returned.
        Returns:
        A texture, or null if no texture is bound for the index by this coordinator.

      • isTextureBoundForIndex

        public boolean isTextureBoundForIndex(ITexture texture,
                                      int textureIndex)
        Description copied from interface: ITextureCoordinator
        Returns whether the given texture is bound on the given index.
        Specified by:
        isTextureBoundForIndex in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture.
        textureIndex - The binding index.
        Returns:
        True if the texture is bound for the index, false if not.

      • getUsedIndexCount

        public int getUsedIndexCount()
        Specified by:
        getUsedIndexCount in interface ITextureCoordinator
        Returns:
